java-activity.name: PerformRollback
java-activity.description: Activity that calls the method HandlerContext.performRollback within the activity code.\nThe parameters of the method determine the rollback data and position behavior.

param.name: RollbackDataBehavior
param.description:
Possible values:
"UpdateVariables": Update process variables
"AddVariables": Add new variables|add-variables
"RestoreVariables": Restore process variables

param.name: RollbackPositionBehavior
param.description: Possible values:\n"MaintainPosition": Maintain current position\n"RestorePosition": Restore current position
